name: FLAPPY CAT (SERGIOManOwaR)
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Flappy cat! Avoid the unavoidable BANS...

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Version 0.4.3 changes:

* Pipes are moving! Some pipes will move up and down  (>40 points)

Version 0.4.2 changes:

* Added few graphic effects

Version 0.4.1 changes:

* Added new item. "EDITED". Avoid it or you will jump less!

Version 0.4 changes:

* Added Invulnerability item.

* Added 'POW' animation when crash.

* Difficult decreased.
